name: Biking & Cruising full day – Saigon River & Cu Chi Tunnels
description: Pick up at your hotel and reach Saigon river pier, simple breakfast before cruising on green bank and quiet water way to the tunnels.The boat goes around Thanh Da Islet and crossing Binh Quoi Village area. Sightseeing and take photos on the way. Then the boat goes upstream of Saigon River.
